alert.note: Alert for Sequoia NP (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 15 at 4:59PM PST until December 16 at 1:00PM PST by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 1 PM PST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of one to two feet above 5,000 feet. Snow amounts of 6 to 12 inches from 3,000 feet to 5,000 feet. Wind will gust as high as 55 mph on exposed ridgetops and near the crest. * WHERE...Sequoia NP. * WHEN...From 10 PM this evening to 1 PM PST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be extremely difficult or nearly impossible. Expect snow covered roads and low visibilities. These hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. Gusty winds may bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
